# imagery

**Type Property**

A map style that represents a satellite image of the area the map displays.

## Declaration

```swift
static var imagery: MapStyle { get }
```

## Discussion



## Map styles

- **hybrid**: A map style that represents a satellite image of the area, including the paths of roads with their names layered on top.
- **standard**: A map style that represents the default map presentation, which is a street map that shows the position of all roads and some road names, depending upon the zoom level of the map.
